questions.question_text_1: Which of the following statements is true for a function f(x, y) that is differentiable at a point (a, b)?
question_texts: Which of the following statements is true for a function f(x, y) that is differentiable at a point (a, b)?

options.option_text: The directional derivative exists in every direction.
The directional derivative is the same in every direction.
The directional derivative can only be calculated along the axes.
The directional derivative does not exist.

questions.question_text_1: Which of the following functions cannot be approximated linearly around x = 0?
question_texts: Which of the following functions cannot be approximated linearly around x = 0?

questions.question_text_1: Consider a dataset from an e-commerce company such as Flipkart that has details of customer behavior, which of the following problems can be best approached using clustering?
question_texts: Consider a dataset from an e-commerce company such as Flipkart that has details of customer behavior, which of the following problems can be best approached using clustering?

options.option_text: Predicting the exact number of sales for each customer segment.
Classifying customers into segments based on labeled customer data.
Identifying inherent groupings in customer data without predefined labels.
Reducing the number of features in the customer dataset.
